wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态： 2011-01-23： 积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开 2011-01-25： 厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开 简要描述： 赶集网SQL注入BUG 详细说明： http://v.ganji.com/退订那里。$.post('/event/cancelSmsNotify/' , {phone : "sdf'dsf"} , function(ret) { alert('退订成功'); }) 注入参数 phone 漏洞证明： phone=sdf'dsf
Fatal error: Uncaught exception 'Exception' with message '1064: You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near 'dsf'' at line 1' in /data/server/www/ganji_v3/framework/data/DBMysqli.class.php:118Stack trace:#0 /data/server/www/ganji_v3/framework/base/BaseModel.class.php(58): DBMysqli->execute('UPDATE `phone_l...')#1 /data/server/www/ganji_v3/apps/lottery/model/LotteryUserModel.php(297): BaseModel->update(Array, Array)#2 /data/server/www/ganji_v3/apps/lottery/controller/LotteryEventController.php(389): LotteryUserModel->updateUserByPhone(Array, 'sdf'dsf')#3 /data/server/www/ganji_v3/apps/lottery/common/LotteryFront.php(130): LotteryEventController::cancelSmsNotifyAction()#4 /data/server/www/ganji_v3/apps/lottery/index.php(16): LotteryFront->dispatch()#5 {main} thrown in /data/server/www/ganji_v3/framework/data/DBMysqli.class.php on line 118
修复方案： 你懂得。。 版权声明：转载请注明来源 Jannock@乌云
